title: Mobile Game-Based Mathematics Pedagogy: Gamification Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics fundamentals and basic curriculum design knowledge
context.additional_context: Participants learn game development tools using personal smartphones or tablets and receive project feedback during offline sessions.

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants acquire the ability to design mathematics lessons incorporating mobile game elements
At least three mathematics activities are developed applying gamification principles (e.g., challenges, reward systems)
Successfully conduct a game-based math lesson demonstration for peer teachers through project-based assessment

resources: Mobile Game Development Tools (Unity Playground, Scratch Jr, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
